dc_title_s: Pilot Chart of the Northern Atlantic Ocean Version 1 (1945) Region: Arctic Area: Greenland; Iceland; Scotland
dc_description_s: Part of the series: Pilot Charts of the Upper Air. All maps are copyright of their respective owners. By downloading and using the map, you are subject to the map's copyright terms and agree to the PGC's Acknowledgement Policy: https://www.pgc.umn.edu/guides/user-services/acknowledgement-policy/. This map was obtained from the Byrd Polar Research Center at The Ohio State University and the digital version is hosted by the Polar Geospatial Center at the University of Minnesota.
